trans-unit.source: We're creating a multi-Master <link><linkText>Galera</linkText><title></title></link> cluster of <link><linkText>MariaDBs</linkText><title></title></link>, a robust, scalable, and reliable drop-in replacement for MySQL, to work in a highly available environment on Azure Virtual Machines.
